name: Pocket Card Jockey
overview: Pocket Card Jockey is a unique crossbreed of a game that combines the thrill of horse racing with the classic card game solitaire. Play solitaire to speed through the races and go for 1st place! The more you race, the more horses you're bound to come across, some of which can be rather striking! If you want to live up to your sponsors' expectations, you'll need to ride your horses to the top and take first place in all 20 of the highest-ranked G1 races!
